item.title: Time Blocking: Maximize Your Efficiency
item.description:
Time Blocking: Maximize Your Efficiency

Time blocking is a method of assigning specific periods for each task to increase focus and efficiency.

How to Time Block

  1. List all tasks for the day.
  2. Assign blocks of 30–90 minutes per task.
  3. Include breaks and buffer time.

Benefits

  • Reduces decision fatigue
  • Creates a predictable workflow
  • Improves task completion rates

“If it’s not scheduled, it won’t get done.”
